desc: upholstery supplies, fabrics, vinyls , textiles, adhesives, for cars, furniture etc . Lifestyle fabrics such as weedmat, wind break netting, frost cloth, bird net. with emphasis on medium to smaller users who need good quality product at reasonable prices, all backed by technical competence. Established in 1988
